mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Munsell, Joel, 1808-1880

mdRecord.dcterms:description: "The Albany annual register for 1849-50" (2 v. in 1) forms vol. 1 of the "Annals of Albany."--Sabin v. 12, p. 470.
